title: Queen Takes, The Text Bubble Wars Are Upon Us 09.12.22
itunes:title: Queen Takes, The Text Bubble Wars Are Upon Us 09.12.22
description:
In episode 1328, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, poet, and host of In Your Hands, Lizzy Cooperman, to discuss… The Queen’s Death Has EVERYONE Talking, The War Over GREEN BUBBLES vs BLUE BUBBLES Is Reaching It’s Propaganda Phase and more!

  1. The Queen’s Death Has EVERYONE Talking
  2. Former Colonies of Elizabeth II Want Their $400 Million Diamond Back From the Crown Jewels
  3. How Britain stole $45 trillion from India
  4. The War Over GREEN BUBBLES vs BLUE BUBBLES Is Reaching It’s Propaganda Phase
  5. Why Apple’s iMessage Is Winning: Teens Dread the Green Text Bubble

LISTEN: Strange Breathin' by Gystere

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
